comments:
Migrating a lib that contains a copied cp (with old diagrams) under anohter cp would produce the followng exception

ava.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.epf.uma.impl.ProcessPackageImpl
	at org.eclipse.epf.diagram.core.services.DiagramManager.getDiagramFilePath(DiagramManager.java:754)
	at org.eclipse.epf.diagram.core.services.DiagramManager.getResource(DiagramManager.java:799)
	at org.eclipse.epf.diagram.core.services.DiagramManager.getResource(DiagramManager.java:786)
	at org.eclipse.epf.migration.diagram.ad.services.WorkflowExportService.export(WorkflowExportService.java:123)
	at org.eclipse.epf.migration.diagram.DiagramMigration.migrate(DiagramMigration.java:85)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.xmi.internal.migration.Migrator103.diagramMigrate(Migrator103.java:133)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.xmi.internal.migration.Migrator103.migrate(Migrator103.java:113)
	at org.eclipse.epf.persistence.migration.MappingUtil.migrate(MappingUtil.java:169)
	at org.eclipse.epf.library.ui.LibraryUIManager$3.execute(LibraryUIManager.java:287)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1737)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:113)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.epf.uma.impl.ProcessPackageImpl
Fixed in Migrator103 by only registering diagram migration elements for top level processes.
*** Bug 183872 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Fix is verified on EPF 1.2 20070426-2205. Close it.
